sub_title: Creative Communications | Creative Strategy | Marketing Strategy | Digital Marketing Strategy | Storytelling and Content Making
summary: Experienced and driven strategist specializing in brand, PR, and marketing strategy, passionate about shaping the future of global brands and products. Known for bridging the gap between strategic thinking and creative execution, thriving in fast-paced environments, and identifying creative territories, crafting narratives, and delivering compelling presentations. My mission is to use the power of business storytelling to inspire, bring beauty and aesthetics to the world, while building warm connections, managing teams, and finding quick solutions in uncertain conditions, with the aim of making a meaningful impact and leaving a lasting legacy.
